page.title: 05PEOPLE AND BUILDINGS/3
page.content:
MR. HAWKINS
The vicarage is quite a large house and 4 to 6 people live in it.The house is almost new it is only 15 years old.Not many people liked the look of the house they said it looked like pavements going up the wall the porch looked rather odd.As long as Mr Hawkins is vicar of Bosbury he owns the house and the land that goes with it which is about quarter of an acre altogether.The vicar said he likes living in Bosbury because it is peaceful and it is a nice area to live in. If he had a chance to move to another house in Bosbury he said he would rather stay in the vicarage.We asked him if he would like to stay in Bosbury or would he rather move to another village he answered he would like to stay in Bosbury.
